listing_jobDesc:
Job description
Having fun is a part of our working culture, so whether this comes in the form of solving complex challenges or in team events. We arrange regular team bonding days to get colleagues to get together and have fun!


Responsibilities:

Run A/B tests and drive business decisions through reliable and reproducible analyses;
Create and code in component-based website with the React+Gatsby framework
Consistently create well-designed, tested code using best practices for website development, including mobile and responsive site design
Collaborate with web designers to realize visual design intent, identify improvements and implement requested features.
Take ownership of your designated projects and tasks.
Designing fully responsive website applications for our clients

Requirements
You Might be a Good Fit if You Have:

Have a degree in computer science or equivalent.
Have 4+ years of experience in Front-end focused Software development HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript (ES5 and ES6+)
Are familiar with SSR, SPA (React, Gatsby), and Typescript
Have a good knowledge of WordPress and GraphQL.
Living in the Netherlands already
Ability to multitask, running many small and big projects at the same time is your strenght
Enjoy collaboration with different teams.
You are solution oriented.
Exceptional communication skills.
Start-up experience is a plus.

Working conditions
Benefits:

You’ll get the latest tech equipment
Competitive yearly salary
Full support on your career/professional development, including access to exhibitions, funded courses etc.
Opportunity to make an impact on OR join – a global team
Flexible working opportunity
Monthly social events

Salary from: €5000,-
Salary to: €6500,-
Work location
Amsterdam
Company description

ID:
1871-52108
Organization:
For an international company in The Hague (NL) I am seeking for a iOS developer with at least 1.5 years of professional experience within the field of mobile development. This company consists of 25 highly educated (Bachelor / Master in the field of IT) professionals who create innovative and complex applications for the telecommunication sector.
Due their international ambitions (they have opened sales offices outside of The Netherlands) the teams consists of professionals from all over the world. Therefore it is not required for a candidate to master the Dutch language; English speaking candidates are welcome to join. The company even assists developers if they are open to relocation to The Netherlands. This makes this vacancy a unique chance for an ambitious, talented iOS developer who is looking for a permanent job in The Netherlands!
Job description:
As a iOS developer you will be working on the development of a complex app which communicates through a JSON Rest/API with the backend. This app will be targeted to business-to-business telecommunication markets worldwide. They use Swift as a basis and you get the opportunity to work on several interesting projects where you are involved in the actual developing and the releasing of the applications. The team consists of iOS but also experienced Android developers so you get the chance to learn from experts within the field of mobile development and so grow significantly as a developer. Once you are 'up and running', you will be given enough freedom and opportunities to approach your work in the way you like. The company is considered very flexible and progressive. Because of the fact that they have multiple teams and different projects, you get to experience multiple aspects of mobile development which will make you a better developer and will keep your work challenging / interesting for a long period of time.
Requirements:
You have a bachelor or master degree with IT componentYou have at least 1.5 years professional experience as a iOS developerYou have experience with Swift developmentYou are ambitious, a teamplayer and self-reliantYou have good knowledge of the English languageYou are open for relocation to The Netherlands on a short notice
Terms of employment:
Your salary depends on your experience and knowledge regarding iOS development.
The range is set between 3000 and 5000 euro gross a month.
You will also receive travel allowance, pension, help with relocation, holiday allowance etc..

This is a GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY for a non-Dutch speaking iOS developer who wants to become part of a growing and ambitious Dutch company.
Interested in this job? Please send me your resume at tim@careervalue.nl or contact me at (0031)615490856.
Employment contract:
Permanent
Salary:
3500 - 5000 euro
Job with:
Permanent location, permanent team, not having to travel far
Specialization:
Native Developer iOS
Related:
IOS ontwikkelaar, Native vacature, Mobile developer, Ontwikkelaar Mobile Apps
Related vacancies:
Zoetermeer: Wisselende apps ontwikkelen als iOS/Android ontwikkelaar
Oegstgeest: Senior Android Developer met Domotica
Zoetermeer: Mobile Developer
Leiden: Informele platte organisatie Mobile developer
Leiden: Senior IoS Developer bij Start-up innovatieve projecten

Contact details:
Respond to this job? Please contact:
Tim Vonk via phone number: +31 (0)88 88 33 072 or mobile phone: +31 (0)6 15 49 08 56.
Applying can also be done by sending an e-mail to tim@careervalue.nl or via WhatsApp. ID:

Do you want to work in an inspiring environment, in which the mindset "If you can imagine it, you can build it"
is central? Then continue reading!
Bedrijfsprofiel
This company was founded on the belief that enterprise software can and should be better. If you can imagine it, you can build it. That is certainly true in IT. The big question is how. As hardcore developers, we live to answer that question. You come prepared with a bag full of know-how, skills, and experience. The company is about 20 employees, 10 of which are developers. The owners are also developers.


The company has several services, for customers such as Akzonobel, FrieslandCampina and T-mobile.
Custom Web Applications
Data Intergration
Portal Development
Infrastructrure Development
API development
Functie omschrijving
They love people who are outspoken but also respect their team members. As employers, they encourage all of their team members to strike their work-life balance. They just love the amazing things you can achieve together. That’s why they believe in co-creation with their customers. They know their business inside out and they have the digital skills to take it to the next level. They go above and beyond to get the job done. And they expect the same commitment from their employees.
The activities are very varied and no two days are the same but a normal day at the job can consist of tasks like:
Devising, building and optimizing new and existing applications
Work all-round on the code, the architecture and the underlying infrastructure
Translate your design choices to your colleagues
Help and support your colleagues where necessary
Come up with solutions that are testable, scalable and reusable
Using language and technology that is suitable for the application
Functie eisen
Excellent language agnostic coding skills with at least 3 years of experience
Experience with authorization-, authentication-, and functional programming methods
Knowledge of languages PHP, JavaScript and TypeScript
Knowledge of framework Laravel, Symfony and Express
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, Go, Linux, Ansible and AWS
Arbeidsvoorwaarden
A good salary with pension scheme and nice extra's
Allowances for traveling, home work, telephone and internet
Challenging work with flexible working hours and the option to work partly from home
A laptop and a full-option work- and home office
Opportunities to grow inside and outside your expertise
Access to our online learning portal Udemy for personal study
A healthy lunch and a massage at your desk
An exciting workplace where technology and fun come together
And above all team outings and a weekly closing on Friday with some drinks

Are you the developer whom we are looking for? Sent an email to Jill Kranenburg at j.kranenburg@haystackpeople.nl or call +31630716577 Meer weergeven

What are you going to do?

Freetime Hospitality is a hospitality company and is looking for experienced C# .NET developers. Our software development department currently consists of an internationaal ‘Scrum’ team. The team comprises C# .NET developers, PHP developers, Front-end developers, Testers and a Product Owner.

You are involved in writing (partial) applications and maintaining, improving and making the current application scalable. There are several challenging projects on our priority list.

We are continuously improving and expanding our VIPS CloudPMS application. Think of automating Payments or a check-in/check-out procedure, expanding CORE functionalities such as multi-language, improving back-end, linking with partners through our OPEN API, and converting the current functions into a modular microservice environment. The basis is always having good quality code and an optimal working method. The goal is to work and improve as a team.

You work in a scrum team with which you determine the priorities together with the Product Owners.
In consultation with the Product Owner, you provide all the necessary documentation and knowledge that you need to carry out the case or project. If necessary, you consult with the stakeholders to collect the right information. Together with the Product Owner and Front-end development & designers, you also provide the right mock-ups and visualizations. When all the information is available, you get to work with the team, make the right documentation and the cases for the upcoming sprint are scheduled. You work in four-weekly sprints and the goal is to complete the jointly planned cases as a team at the end of the sprint. For each sprint, the planned cases are 'ranked' [high-low split] and at the end of the sprint you evaluate together with the team how everything went.

What do we offer?
A position with substance, freedom, responsibility and career opportunities.
Good conditions: competitive salary, 24 vacation days and appropriate allowances. We also think about your old age: you’ll be eligible for a collective pension scheme.
A place within an enthusiastic, growing organization where the ambience and team spirit are essential. Where you get the space to learn, including trial and error, everyone shares knowledge with each other and memorable company outings are the norm.
Everything you need to perform your task properly, including: sit and stand desk, enough breaks and coffee.
Attention to personal development.
Having lunch together with your colleagues every day; you can leave your own sandwiches at home!
Working in an international environment.
What do we seek from you?

We are looking for an experienced C#.NET developer who lives in the Netherlands and can contribute knowledge and experience to improve and expand the current application.

We have a passion for developers with opinions and ideas. We think it is important that as a senior developer you can control, manage and, where necessary, improve the quality of the code and the work processes. In addition, we expect that you have:

An analytical view.
Sufficient experience to solve complex software problems.
Experience with large systems with a lot of volume.
Experience with MVC (C#/.NET), Module Pattern (Angular) and/or other patterns.
A good knowledge of SOAP, REST and JSON.
Knowledge of other technologies such as web servers, internet protocols, file systems, command line management and tools such as FTP.
A good command of English, both spoken and written.
Nice to have:
PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby or a similar development language;
MySQL, node.js and/or Grunt;
Cloud computing technologies and/or mobile apps;
Affinity with the hospitality/hotel industry.
Do we have a match?

If the position and our company appeal to you and you want to get the most out of yourself (almost) every day, you can send an application with CV and motivation letter to: Yvette Langermans (HR Manager).

Do you have any questions about this gratifying and versatile position? Then you can also contact her by phone at 06-33333299 or via e-mail.

Interesse in de functie van .NET developer bij Freetime Hospitality regio Nieuwegein?
Reageer nu met je CV en motivatie via de "solliciteer" button.

Cloud computing technologies and/or mobile apps;
Affinity with the hospitality/hotel industry.
Do we have a match?

If the position and our company appeal to you and you want to get the most out of yourself (almost) every day, you can send an application with CV and motivation letter to: Yvette Langermans (HR Manager).

Do you have any questions about this gratifying and versatile position? Then you can also contact her by phone at 06-33333299 or via e-mail.

Interesse in de functie van .NET developer bij Freetime Hospitality regio Nieuwegein?
Reageer nu met je CV en motivatie via de "solliciteer" button.

Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld. What are you going to do?

Freetime Hospitality is a hospitality company and is looking for experienced C# .NET developers. Our software development department currently consists of an internationaal ‘Scrum’ team. The team comprises C# .NET developers, PHP developers, Front-end developers, Testers and a Product Owner.

You are involved in writing (partial) applications and maintaining, improving and making the current application scalable. There are several challenging projects on our priority list.

We are continuously improving and expanding our VIPS CloudPMS application. Think of automating Payments or a check-in/check-out procedure, expanding CORE functionalities such as multi-language, improving back-end, linking with partners through our OPEN API, and converting the current functions into a modular microservice environment. The basis is always having good quality code and an optimal working method. The goal is to work and improve as a team.

You work in a scrum team with which you determine the priorities together with the Product Owners.
In consultation with the Product Owner, you provide all the necessary documentation and knowledge that you need to carry out the case or project. If necessary, you consult with the stakeholders to collect the right information. Together with the Product Owner and Front-end development & designers, you also provide the right mock-ups and visualizations. When all the information is available, you get to work with the team, make the right documentation and the cases for the upcoming sprint are scheduled. You work in four-weekly sprints and the goal is to complete the jointly planned cases as a team at the end of the sprint. For each sprint, the planned cases are 'ranked' [high-low split] and at the end of the sprint you evaluate together with the team how everything went.

What do we offer?
A position with substance, freedom, responsibility and career opportunities.
Good conditions: competitive salary, 24 vacation days and appropriate allowances. We also think about your old age: you’ll be eligible for a collective pension scheme.
A place within an enthusiastic, growing organization where the ambience and team spirit are essential. Where you get the space to learn, including trial and error, everyone shares knowledge with each other and memorable company outings are the norm.
Everything you need to perform your task properly, including: sit and stand desk, enough breaks and coffee.
Attention to personal development.
Having lunch together with your colleagues every day; you can leave your own sandwiches at home!
Working in an international environment.
What do we seek from you?

We are looking for an experienced C#.NET developer who lives in the Netherlands and can contribute knowledge and experience to improve and expand the current application.

We have a passion for developers with opinions and ideas. We think it is important that as a senior developer you can control, manage and, where necessary, improve the quality of the code and the work processes. In addition, we expect that you have:

An analytical view.
Sufficient experience to solve complex software problems.
Experience with large systems with a lot of volume.
Experience with MVC (C#/.NET), Module Pattern (Angular) and/or other patterns.
A good knowledge of SOAP, REST and JSON.
Knowledge of other technologies such as web servers, internet protocols, file systems, command line management and tools such as FTP.
A good command of English, both spoken and written.
Nice to have:
PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby or a similar development language;
MySQL, node.js and/or Grunt;
Cloud computing technologies and/or mobile apps;
Affinity with the hospitality/hotel industry.
Do we have a match?

If the position and our company appeal to you and you want to get the most out of yourself (almost) every day, you can send an application with CV and motivation letter to: Yvette Langermans (HR Manager).

Do you have any questions about this gratifying and versatile position? Then you can also contact her by phone at 06-33333299 or via e-mail.

Reageer nu met je CV en motivatie via de "solliciteer" button.

In this role you’ll work as Senior Android Developer for a fast growing Dutch Mobile company. Together with your team you’ll work on a variety of innovative apps. You will write, maintain, develop, add new features to existing mobile applications. You will also review code. Why us ... probably you have used one of their apps without knowing it ...
Requirements
You have 3+ years experience with Android Development
You are familiar with Gitflow
You are familiar with code review
You have a bachelors degree in IT or related study
You are passionate and eager to learn
You are thinking in solutions
You are communicative, enthousiastic
You visit conferences and read about the latest technologies
You are able to support Junior & Medior Android developers and are open for feedback yourself
You have a Dutch visa and live in The Netherlands

Company profile

We are The House of Appril – an agency based in Amsterdam for experienced app developers. We are here to inspire, guide and to help you find your next job or temporary assignment. We do this by helping you with our events (Appdevcon, appril festival), network and our guidance.
Our client is a fast growing Dutch company in Amsterdam. Their team is devoted and passionate about building high quality Mobile Applications. They build mobile apps for advertisement agencies, start-ups, well known brands and publishers.

Benefits
Salary between €4100 - €5800
Travel allowance
Paid holidays 26 days
Organizing hackatons
Flexible working hours
Pension plan
Exciting projects to work on
Friday afternoon 'borreltje'
Opportunities for personal development, and yess, it does not have to be work related :-)

ID:
12614-31678
De Organisatie:
Voor een goede klant van mij die actief is door heel Nederland ben ik op zoek naar meerdere Senior .NET Developers. Je komt bij mijn klant in dienst via een medium-lance constructie, wat betekent dat je hier zowel de voordelen van een vaste baan als de financiële voordelen van freelancen krijgt. Je kunt hier dan ook bakken met geld verdienen met hetgeen jij het liefste doet: Prachtige (web)applicaties ontwikkelen in .NET!

Samen met jouw nieuwe werkgever ga je kijken naar geschikte opdrachten die jou aanspreken. Je komt altijd op projecten die binnen een goed bereisbare afstand van je woonplaats liggen en waar jij technisch uitgedaagd wordt. Je gaat je hier dan ook niet vervelen!
De Functie:
Als Senior .NET Developer kom jij terecht bij toonaangevende opdrachtgevers. Je gaat aan de slag met de nieuwste technieken. Er wordt gekeken welke technieken jij beheerst en er wordt vervolgens gekeken met welke opdrachtgever dat matcht. De technieken die vaak terugkomen zijn bijvoorbeeld:
.NET Core, C# en ASP.NET framework 1.0 t/m 4.7;LINQ, MVC, WPF en SQL Server 2008/2012/2014/2016/2017;Javascript, HTML, XML, jQuery en frameworks als React en Angular;Design Patterns;NoSQL, Microservices, Continuous Delivery, TDD, BDD en Single Page Applications;Azure, Mobile Development en Sharepoint;Scrum/Agile.

Uiteraard is het geen enkel probleem als jij niet alle bovenstaande technieken beheerst. Overigens krijg jij hier natuurlijk wel uitgebreid de ruimte om nieuwe technieken te leren en jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen!
Gevraagd Profiel:
Je bent inzetbaar als Fullstack .NET Developer op Senior niveau;Je hebt ervaring of interesse in het werken op detacherings/consultancybasis;Je hebt een afgeronde HBO opleiding in een relevante richting;Je hebt goede communicatieve skills.
Arbeidsvoorwaarden:
Vanzelfsprekend zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden in een medium-lance-constructie erg goed. Zo krijg je:
De mogelijkheid een zeer goed salaris te verdienen (tot € 80.000 per jaar);Een uitstekende mobiliteitsregeling (keuze uit leaseauto, NS Business Card, kilometervergoeding of mobiliteitsvergoeding);Een telefoonvergoeding;Ruime opleidingsmogelijkheden;Een goede pensioenregeling;25 vakantiedagen;En nog veel meer!

Klinkt dit goed en wil je graag solliciteren, of heb je nog aanvullende vragen? Neem dan contact met mij op via 0615490856 of door te mailen naar tim@careervalue.nl!
Dienstverband:
Vast
Salaris:
Boven marktconform
Functie met:
Leaseauto, regelmatig werkzaamheden verrichten op klantlocatie, klanten bezoeken, auto van de zaak, consultancy
Specialisatie:
Fullstack Developer
Gerelateerd:
Fullstack, C#, ASP, CSS, HTML, CSS, SQL, Javascript, WPF, WLF
Gerelateerde vacatures:

Hilversum: Als .NET developer tot €80.000 per jaar verdienen

Jacqueline de Gruyter
Cell phone: (020) 2157 446

Work phone: (020) 2157 446  In this role you’ll work as Senior iOS Developer for a fast growing Dutch Mobile company. Together with your team you’ll work on a variety of innovative apps. You will write, maintain, develop, add new features to existing mobile applications. You will also review code. Why us ... probably you have used one of their apps without knowing it ...
Requirements
You have 4+ years experience with iOS Development
You have experience with Objective-C, Swift & SwiftUI
You are familiar with Gitflow
You are familiar with code review
You have a bachelors degree in IT or related study
You are passionate and eager to learn
You are thinking in solutions
You are communicative, enthousiastic
You visit conferences and read about the latest technologies
You are able to support Junior & Medior Android developers and are open for feedback yourself
You have a Dutch visa and live in The Netherlands

Company profile

We are The House of Appril – an agency based in Amsterdam for experienced app developers. We are here to inspire, guide and to help you find your next job or temporary assignment. We do this by helping you with our events (Appdevcon, appril festival), network and our guidance.
Our client is a fast growing Dutch company in Amsterdam. Their team is devoted and passionate about building high quality Mobile Applications. They build mobile apps for advertisement agencies, start-ups, well known brands and publishers.

Benefits
Salary between €4100 - €5800
Travel allowance
Paid holidays 26 days
Organizing hackatons
Flexible working hours
Pension plan
Exciting projects to work on
Friday afternoon 'borreltje'
Opportunities for personal development, and yess, it does not have to be work related :-)
Latest hardware to work with

ID:
11701-27885
Organization:
Our client is a very well-known online company that specializes in selling A quality garments. The company was founded as a start-up only a few years ago but through a unique vision, very stylish products in a new niche they have made it quite well for themselves. This company has grown far beyond the web-shop alone, they have different sales channels, online and offline and lead the branch by example.
Because of the expanding business and endless opportunities this company had, they are looking for enforcement in the form of an experienced PHP developer.
Job description:
As part of their team, you will be collaborating with a mix of permanent and freelance developers, and you will be working in an agile way. The role involves exposure to Symfony 3, building new websites, as well as adding new features to existing websites. This includes application code and database structure, so a good level of SQL knowledge is essential.
Requirements:
Excellent PHP skills (Symfony / Laravel)
SQL skills and working knowledge of MySQL & PostgreSQL
JavaScript, jQuery
HTML, CSS

Terms of employment:
Competitive salary, bonusses, certifications, pension, benefits

Permanent

ID:
2086-64152
Organization:
For my client, a software company in Apeldoorn, I'm currently seeking for a test automation engineer who has experience with building and implementing a test automation framework. The company helps other organizations with their IT-challenges and is currently growing rapidly. They are even expanding their business outside of The Netherlands which means that extra testing capacity is necessary.
Currently the team consists of 150 ambitious people who work together in a modern and spacious office. The company has a informal culture with plenty of room for fun and personal growth. At the moment, many members of the development team work from home and also in the future there will be enough flexibility to work partially remote.

This job requires you to live in The Netherlands and to have previous experience working for a Dutch company.
Job description:
As a test automation engineer you will help the company with its goal to implement test automation. At the moment there are three other software testers within the team but none of them has the right experience to build a framework from scratch; therefore this will be your responsibility. As a team you will be optimizing the quality of the webapplications, mobile applications and softwareproducts the company produces. Besides test automation, this means you will also be setting up and executing end-to-end tests and user acceptance tests.
Currently the development team has made a small start with setting up test automation with the use of Cypress. (The software engineers developer with .NET). However, as a test automation expert you will have the power to advise them and even use other frameworks if necessary. It's a role with both responsibility and freedom.
Requirements:
You have a Bachelor / Master (preferably in the field of IT)You have at least 3 years experience as a test (automation) engineerYou have experience working in an Agile teamPreferably you can write your own codeYou currently live in the NetherlandsYou already have experience working in The Netherlands
Terms of employment:
This is a permanent job within a growing, international company with high ambitions.

Your salary will be up to 5000 euro gross per month.
Besides a good salary, you
have the possibility to work 32 or 36 hours a weekcan work partially from homecan buy vacation dayscan grow within the company

Where will you be working?
This player in the world of real estate has a number of aspects in high esteem: health, sustainability and innovation. Reducing waste and emissions in the construction of new real estate, that is the ultimate goal of this company. How do you ask? By combining big data analytics and Cloud Computing, this company has developed a unique platform. This platform is now used worldwide to optimise new and existing real estate.
Functie
What will you be doing?
You will be working in a department where you will be working with fellow developers and data scientists. Your tasks will include collaborating on mobile applications, data interfaces, integrating data streams from real estate with the platform and developing new features. Besides real estate data such as building management and data from sensors, you will also work with tenants of buildings. For example: booking systems, access controls, etc.
Techniques you will be dealing with include: C#, ASP.NET Core, Razor Pages, REST, Azure Service Bus, VueJS and various parts of the Azure IoT-Stack.
Together with external partner companies including Microsoft, you will work on a brand new Azure IoT platform. In short, this is a technical challenge in itself!
Given the fact that you will be working with various departments within the company, some experience in this is also desirable.
Eisen
What are the requirements?

Academic backgroundFrom 1 year experience with Azure DevOpsExperience with ASP.NET Core, C#, JQuery and PowershellExperience with Azure components such as: CosmosDB, Azure SQL and Function AppsExperience with Object Oriented Programming
Aanbod
What is Offered?

Salary range up to €70.000 per year based on 40 hoursFulltime job in a beautiful office buildingExcellent lunch facilities25 free holiday days + 3 fixedFlexible working hoursVery interesting bonus systemFully covered public transport costs + €0.19 per KM (unlimited) Where will you be working?

Do you want to work as a Junior React Native Developer within an international tech company that specializes in streaming services?
Company profile
This company is an international tech company that specializes in streaming services. You often see streaming services that only use 1 platform and offer everything on that. This company has chosen to do things a little differently. They have multiple platforms within the company, all with their own niche focus. Do you like romantic movies? Then they offer a platform for this, where you will only see films that fall into this genre. To achieve this, they have exclusive deals with world-class production companies and produce their films.
They were founded in 2016 and are now active in more than 8 countries, including Norway and Sweden. They are now one of the fastest-growing Subscription Video-on-Demand companies in the Netherlands and have an annual growth rate of more than 100%. They are based in Hilversum, they have a development team of 15 people, divided over several teams, where each team has its own focus area.
Job description
As a Junior React Native Developer, you are responsible together with your team to ensure the user-friendliness on all platforms. Smooth streaming, smart applications, and high-quality content make the platforms successful. You will shape the future of software products and services. Think of developing the mobile apps, Smart TV apps for LG and Samsung, adding functions such as “download to go” and similar projects. You will also design, build, implement and support their software infrastructure. As a Junior React Native Developer, you will provide growth to the team and be responsible of bringing the team to the next level. You are also responsible for further developing the platform and to make it more efficient to use.
Job requirements
Six months to a year of front-end experience
React Native experience (is a plus)
Manage basic software development
You are responsible for further developing their platform
Working conditions
Salary up to 3000 gross per month
Lots of freedom and flexible working hours
Hybrid way of working, where you are at the office at least once a week
8% holiday allowance
25 vacation days

Interested and want to know more? Send an email to m.issa@haystackpeople.nl or call 06-82064191! Do you want to work as a Junior React Native Developer within an international tech company that specializes in streaming services?
Company profile
This company is an international tech company that specializes in streaming services. You often see streaming services that only use 1 platform and offer everything on that. This company has chosen to do things a little differently. They have multiple platforms within the company, all with their own niche focus. Do you like romantic movies? Then they offer a platform for this, where you will only see films that fall into this genre. To achieve this, they have exclusive deals with world-class production companies and produce their films.
They were founded in 2016 and are now active in more than 8 countries, including Norway and Sweden. They are now one of the fastest-growing Subscription Video-on-Demand companies in the Netherlands and have an annual growth rate of more than 100%. They are based in Hilversum, they have a development team of 15 people, divided over several teams, where each team has its own focus area.
Job description
As a Junior React Native Developer, you are responsible together with your team to ensure the user-friendliness on all platforms. Smooth streaming, smart applications, and high-quality content make the platforms successful. You will shape the future of software products and services. Think of developing the mobile apps, Smart TV apps for LG and Samsung, adding functions such as “download to go” and similar projects. You will also design, build, implement and support their software infrastructure. As a Junior React Native Developer, you will provide growth to the team and be responsible of bringing the team to the next level. You are also responsible for further developing the platform and to make it more efficient to use.
Job requirements
Six months to a year of front-end experience
React Native experience (is a plus)
Manage basic software development
You are responsible for further developing their platform
Working conditions
Salary up to 3000 gross per month
Lots of freedom and flexible working hours
Hybrid way of working, where you are at the office at least once a week
8% holiday allowance
25 vacation days

Where will you be working?
This player in the world of real estate has a number of aspects in high esteem: health, sustainability and innovation. Reducing waste and emissions in the construction of new real estate, that is the ultimate goal of this company. How do you ask? By combining big data analytics and Cloud Computing, this company has developed a unique platform. This platform is now used worldwide to optimise new and existing real estate.
Functie
What will you be doing?
You will be working in a department where you will be working with fellow developers and data scientists. Your tasks will include collaborating on mobile applications, data interfaces, integrating data streams from real estate with the platform and developing new features. Besides real estate data such as building management and data from sensors, you will also work with tenants of buildings. For example: booking systems, access controls, etc.
Techniques you will be dealing with include: C#, ASP.NET Core, Razor Pages, REST, Azure Service Bus, VueJS and various parts of the Azure IoT-Stack.
Together with external partner companies including Microsoft, you will work on a brand new Azure IoT platform. In short, this is a technical challenge in itself!
Given the fact that you will be working with various departments within the company, some experience in this is also desirable.
Eisen
What are the requirements?

Academic backgroundFrom 1 year experience with Azure DevOpsExperience with ASP.NET Core, C#, JQuery and PowershellExperience with Azure components such as: CosmosDB, Azure SQL and Function AppsExperience with Object Oriented Programming
Aanbod
What is Offered?

What are you going to do?

Freetime Hospitality is a hospitality company and is looking for experienced C# .NET developers. Our software development department currently consists of an internationaal ‘Scrum’ team. The team comprises C# .NET developers, PHP developers, Front-end developers, Testers and a Product Owner.

You are involved in writing (partial) applications and maintaining, improving and making the current application scalable. There are several challenging projects on our priority list.

We are continuously improving and expanding our VIPS CloudPMS application. Think of automating Payments or a check-in/check-out procedure, expanding CORE functionalities such as multi-language, improving back-end, linking with partners through our OPEN API, and converting the current functions into a modular microservice environment. The basis is always having good quality code and an optimal working method. The goal is to work and improve as a team.

You work in a scrum team with which you determine the priorities together with the Product Owners.
In consultation with the Product Owner, you provide all the necessary documentation and knowledge that you need to carry out the case or project. If necessary, you consult with the stakeholders to collect the right information. Together with the Product Owner and Front-end development & designers, you also provide the right mock-ups and visualizations. When all the information is available, you get to work with the team, make the right documentation and the cases for the upcoming sprint are scheduled. You work in four-weekly sprints and the goal is to complete the jointly planned cases as a team at the end of the sprint. For each sprint, the planned cases are 'ranked' [high-low split] and at the end of the sprint you evaluate together with the team how everything went.

What do we offer?
A position with substance, freedom, responsibility and career opportunities.
Good conditions: competitive salary, 24 vacation days and appropriate allowances. We also think about your old age: you’ll be eligible for a collective pension scheme.
A place within an enthusiastic, growing organization where the ambience and team spirit are essential. Where you get the space to learn, including trial and error, everyone shares knowledge with each other and memorable company outings are the norm.
Everything you need to perform your task properly, including: sit and stand desk, enough breaks and coffee.
Attention to personal development.
Having lunch together with your colleagues every day; you can leave your own sandwiches at home!
Working in an international environment.
What do we seek from you?

We are looking for an experienced C#.NET developer who lives in the Netherlands and can contribute knowledge and experience to improve and expand the current application.

We have a passion for developers with opinions and ideas. We think it is important that as a senior developer you can control, manage and, where necessary, improve the quality of the code and the work processes. In addition, we expect that you have:

An analytical view.
Sufficient experience to solve complex software problems.
Experience with large systems with a lot of volume.
Experience with MVC (C#/.NET), Module Pattern (Angular) and/or other patterns.
A good knowledge of SOAP, REST and JSON.
Knowledge of other technologies such as web servers, internet protocols, file systems, command line management and tools such as FTP.
A good command of English, both spoken and written.
Nice to have:
PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby or a similar development language;
MySQL, node.js and/or Grunt;
Cloud computing technologies and/or mobile apps;
Affinity with the hospitality/hotel industry.
Do we have a match?

If the position and our company appeal to you and you want to get the most out of yourself (almost) every day, you can send an application with CV and motivation letter to: Yvette Langermans (HR Manager).

Do you have any questions about this gratifying and versatile position? Then you can also contact her by phone at 06-33333299 or via e-mail.

Reageer nu met je CV en motivatie via de "solliciteer" button.

In this role you’ll work as Senior Android Developer for a fast growing Dutch Mobile company. Together with your team you’ll work on a variety of innovative apps. You will write, maintain, develop, add new features to existing mobile applications. You will also review code. Why us ... probably you have used one of their apps without knowing it ...
Requirements
You have 3+ years experience with Android Development
You are familiar with Gitflow
You are familiar with code review
You have a bachelors degree in IT or related study
You are passionate and eager to learn
You are thinking in solutions
You are communicative, enthousiastic
You visit conferences and read about the latest technologies
You are able to support Junior & Medior Android developers and are open for feedback yourself
You have a Dutch visa and live in The Netherlands

Company profile

We are The House of Appril – an agency based in Amsterdam for experienced app developers. We are here to inspire, guide and to help you find your next job or temporary assignment. We do this by helping you with our events (Appdevcon, appril festival), network and our guidance.
Our client is a fast growing Dutch company in Amsterdam. Their team is devoted and passionate about building high quality Mobile Applications. They build mobile apps for advertisement agencies, start-ups, well known brands and publishers.

Benefits
Salary between €4100 - €5800
Travel allowance
Paid holidays 26 days
Organizing hackatons
Flexible working hours
Pension plan
Exciting projects to work on
Friday afternoon 'borreltje'
Opportunities for personal development, and yess, it does not have to be work related :-)
Latest hardware to work with

For questions about this or the other vacancies, or want to know more what we do, please contact: info@thehouseofappril.com or call: 020- 215 7446.

Hou je van Agile werken in een dynamische omgeving waarin ruimte is voor innovatie en continue verbetering? Als jij een developer bent die zich wil bijscholen in onze ontwikkeltooling Outsystems en Oracle, dan zoeken wij jou.Wat ga je doen?Je werkt samen met je collega developers, testers en requirements engineers aan het uitwerken van de epics op onze roadmap.In onze (Scrumban) teams zorg jij ervoor dat stories worden gegroomed en gebouwd en probeer je bij te dragen aan onze experimenteersessies.Je bent in staat stories zelfstandig uit te werken, rekening houdend met onze standaarden en eisen vanuit architectuur etc.Je bent geïnteresseerd in de (technische) ontwikkelingen in je vakgebied en probeert van daaruit bij te dragen aan verbeteringen die wij kunnen doorvoeren bijvoorbeeld in de architectuur, gebruikte technologieën en patterns.Wij zetten Oracle plsql in om data op te halen uit een Oracle database. Vervolgens wordt in onze generieke business layer de business logica gebouwd en daarboven de applicatielogica, Hiervoor maken wij gebruik van Outsystems als ontwikkelplatform. Je hebt hier of al ervaring in, of je wilt je hier graag in bekwamen.Wat breng je mee?Kennis van / ervaring met:Uitmuntende kennis van minimaal één 3e generatie programmeertaal, hoeft niet noodzakelijk een relatie te hebben met Oracle en/of OutSystemsVermogen om analytisch en op hoog abstractieniveau te denkenDe volgende kennis is een pré:Oracle stack:Oracle Database (incl. pl/sql en sql)Oracle Designer en Oracle DeveloperOracle application serverKennis van integraties zoals RabbitMQ, Soap, REST, XML, JSON etc.Kennis van web en mobileKennis van OutsystemsKennis van ElasticSearchEn als persoon:Heb je een klantgerichte instellingNeem je verantwoordelijkheid en initiatiefBen je creatief en oplossingsgerichtBeschik je over goede communicatieve vaardigheden en flexibiliteitWat vragen wij?Afgeronde HBO/WO opleiding met een ICT component of vergelijkbaarMinimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaringWat bieden wij?Een uitdagende werkomgeving en interessante klanten in een dynamische brancheEen informele cultuur met veel vrijheid in je werkRuimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling en verdere groeiMarktconforme primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaardenWie zijn wij?Pivoton is dé IT-business partner voor de flexmarkt met een unieke combinatie van expertises op het gebied van het uitzendproces, IT-oplossingen en wet- en regelgeving. Deze kennis hebben wij in meer dan 30 jaar opgebouwd en dat maakt ons een gerespecteerde IT partner binnen de flexmarkt.Pivoton biedt software voor de administratieve en commerciële processen in de flexmarkt als SaaS-oplossing en verzorgt de complete backoffice verwerking van urendeclaraties en facturatie. Wij geven klanten samenhangend advies en begeleiding bij het inrichten, inzetten, optimaliseren en onderhouden van de IT-oplossingen die bepalend zijn voor hun toekomst. Volledige ontzorging en procesoptimalisatie staan hierbij altijd voorop. We doen dit samen met ongeveer 35 collega’s op een informele wijze waarbij flexibiliteit en samenwerking belangrijke drivers zijn. Job description
Having fun is a part of our working culture, so whether this comes in the form of solving complex challenges or in team events. We arrange regular team bonding days to get colleagues to get together and have fun!


Responsibilities:

Run A/B tests and drive business decisions through reliable and reproducible analyses;
Create and code in component-based website with the React+Gatsby framework
Consistently create well-designed, tested code using best practices for website development, including mobile and responsive site design
Collaborate with web designers to realize visual design intent, identify improvements and implement requested features.
Take ownership of your designated projects and tasks.
Designing fully responsive website applications for our clients

Requirements
You Might be a Good Fit if You Have:

Have a degree in computer science or equivalent.
Have 4+ years of experience in Front-end focused Software development HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript (ES5 and ES6+)
Are familiar with SSR, SPA (React, Gatsby), and Typescript
Have a good knowledge of WordPress and GraphQL.
Living in the Netherlands already
Ability to multitask, running many small and big projects at the same time is your strenght
Enjoy collaboration with different teams.
You are solution oriented.
Exceptional communication skills.
Start-up experience is a plus.

Working conditions
Benefits:

You’ll get the latest tech equipment
Competitive yearly salary
Full support on your career/professional development, including access to exhibitions, funded courses etc.
Opportunity to make an impact on OR join – a global team
Flexible working opportunity
Monthly social events

Salary from: €5000,-
Salary to: €6500,-
Work location
Amsterdam

Your new job and office
About the job
Being a Developer for Flutter at AH Technology means you are responsible, together with other developers, for the technical aspects of our Flutter applications, and in particular for our Food First Lifestyle coach app. Find it in the Play store and in the App store.
Albert Heijn is one of the first companies who adopted Flutter for strategic mobile solutions. At AH Technology we adopt modern technologies fast when we see the potential of it for our customers or our company. We developed our Food First Lifestyle coach app - for a better and healthier lifestyle - in Flutter, and also a few other apps, like our Compact app. Flutter is here to stay at Albert Heijn and you can help us embed this technology even more in our organisation.
As a passionate developer you participate in the ideation of new cool initiatives. You participate in standups and refinements, write code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests, and manage releases. You support product or platform architects when needed, and guide and coach other (junior) developers.
This is in more detail what the job entails and what we value:
You have a clear view on new tools or frameworks, or how changes in the language and new features in the SDK can help improve your product.
You feel adding value to the product is your default mode.
And you ensure this is done using the most efficient and best-working tools and techniques.
Consistent, malleable, well documented and tested code is common sense for you.
But you also know that code is more often read than written .
And that refactoring messy parts of the codebase is a normal part of your day (Boy Scout rule ftw!).
You think about long-term challenges, and ways to improve a large code base with 20 regular contributors.
And lost, but not least you re an expert in keeping things DRY, Clean and SOLID.
Curious about our tech stack? Here s a little sneak peak: Flutter, Dart, Github and Github Actions, Firebase, bloc (flutter_bloc), get_it, chopper and, swagger_dart_code_generator, mocktail and golden_toolkit.
Your new office
At AH Technology you work with the best experts in the field. In an open environment, where expertise is valued, where we learn from each other and have the freedom to innovate. Our mobile development community counts more than 50+ Mobile Developers.
For more information about AH Technology, you can also visit:
Stack Overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/companies/ah-technology-albert-heijn

Our blogs: https://blog.ah.technology/
Working in a hybrid way is possible (home and office), and our office is located near the train station of Zaandam.
AH Tech Academy
In 2021 we launched our brand new AH Tech Academy. A learning environment organized by and for our colleagues, together with external training partners. The AH Tech Academy is a platform that supports you in your daily work and learning on a daily basis. It offers a variety of courses and training sessions. Besides, the academy is a platform to share experiences and learn from each other's expertise. You will not only find software development trainings, also Agile courses, time management, presentation training and more. You can get your certifications and visit conferences. We invest time, budget and room for both your personal and professional growth. As we are further developing this platform and adding courses and trainings on the go, you can already enjoy the benefits of this program.
What do we offer?
The right ingredients for an impactful job
An annual salary between 50-85K, depending on your experience and based on a full-time workweek (40 hours);
Possibility to work 32-40 hours a week
An additional yearly bonus
An attractive pension plan of which we pay out over 4x times the amount you contribute to the fund. So you ll continue to enjoy a comfortable income even after retiring :-)
A minimum of 20 plus 12.5 extra days paid vacation. Do you want to take that extra time off, or would you rather convert the extra days into discounts or sell them for cash? It s up to you!
Follow training and courses via our AH Tech Academy.
Travel expenses, a laptop and smartphone.
10% staff discount on groceries in all Albert Heijn stores, up to 300 discount a year.
The opportunity to provide everyone with a healthier, tastier, and more sustainable diet.
Requirements
What do you bring
At AH Technology you will be working for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands. To become successful as our new developer you bring:
A Technology/IT Engineering Bachelor certificate or master's degree, or equivalent work experience;
Strong experience as Developer of mobile apps, in native iOS/Android is a must. Also proven experience with Flutter and Dart is a requirement;
Know your way around with Git/Github;
Knowledge and experience on SOLID principles, clean architecture, and testing;
We are looking for both experienced and less experienced mobile developers. Depending on the level of experience you bring, you support product or platform architects when needed, and guide and coach other developers. If you don't check all the boxes, don't worry, we probably don't do either ;-). Feel free to apply and let us have a look at your resume.
More information?
Irene van Rosmalen (Talent Acquisition Partner technology) and hiring manager Jeroen Buitenhuis (Head of Tech) will be happy to help you via irene.van.rosmalen@ah.nl or send a WhatsApp to Irene via 06-23 62 04 40.
Please note: you have already a valid working permit to work in the Netherlands. We can offer extension of your sponsorship, but currently don’t offer relocation from abroad.
About AH Technology
You probably already know who we are. Albert Heijn goes way back. More than 130 years, to be exact. So for millions of people, food shopping is synonymous with the Albert Heijn brand. We didn’t achieve this with a complacent, ‘hey, if it works today, it’ll work tomorrow’ approach, but by continually rethinking our propositions and staying plugged in to customer demands. Over 1,000 stores? Check. The leading online food retail platform? Check, we build, run and love it. ;-)
So what’s next? Accelerating our transition into a hybrid Food & Tech company is. We want to leverage data and technology to future-proof food shopping and make better food more easily accessible to everyone. At AH Technology, you team up with inspiring peers in the data, digital and tech domains. A community of diverse individuals who share a common goal; to create digital solutions that make (online) shopping simpler and more inspiring. Are you ready to reinvent the way millions of people buy and enjoy their food? We invest heavily in data, digital and tech. And that includes investing in your career!

IT
NLD-Zaandam, Provincialeweg 11

About AH Technology
You probably already know who we are. Albert Heijn goes way back. More than 130 years, to be exact. So for millions of people, food shopping is synonymous with the Albert Heijn brand. We didn’t achieve this with a complacent, ‘hey, if it works today, it’ll work tomorrow’ approach, but by continually rethinking our propositions and staying plugged in to customer demands. Over 1,000 stores? Check. The leading online food retail platform? Check, we build, run and love it. ;-)
So what’s next? Accelerating our transition into a hybrid Food & Tech company is. We want to leverage data and technology to future-proof food shopping and make better food more easily accessible to everyone. At AH Technology, you team up with inspiring peers in the data, digital and tech domains. A community of diverse individuals who share a common goal; to create digital solutions that make (online) shopping simpler and more inspiring. Are you ready to reinvent the way millions of people buy and enjoy their food? We invest heavily in data, digital and tech. And that includes investing in your career! Your new job and office
About the job
Being a Developer for Flutter at AH Technology means you are responsible, together with other developers, for the technical aspects of our Flutter applications, and in particular for our Food First Lifestyle coach app. Find it in the Play store and in the App store.
Albert Heijn is one of the first companies who adopted Flutter for strategic mobile solutions. At AH Technology we adopt modern technologies fast when we see the potential of it for our customers or our company. We developed our Food First Lifestyle coach app - for a better and healthier lifestyle - in Flutter, and also a few other apps, like our Compact app. Flutter is here to stay at Albert Heijn and you can help us embed this technology even more in our organisation.
As a passionate developer you participate in the ideation of new cool initiatives. You participate in standups and refinements, write code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests, and manage releases. You support product or platform architects when needed, and guide and coach other (junior) developers.
This is in more detail what the job entails and what we value:
You have a clear view on new tools or frameworks, or how changes in the language and new features in the SDK can help improve your product.
You feel adding value to the product is your default mode.
And you ensure this is done using the most efficient and best-working tools and techniques.
Consistent, malleable, well documented and tested code is common sense for you.
But you also know that code is more often read than written .
And that refactoring messy parts of the codebase is a normal part of your day (Boy Scout rule ftw!).
You think about long-term challenges, and ways to improve a large code base with 20 regular contributors.
And lost, but not least you re an expert in keeping things DRY, Clean and SOLID.
Curious about our tech stack? Here s a little sneak peak: Flutter, Dart, Github and Github Actions, Firebase, bloc (flutter_bloc), get_it, chopper and, swagger_dart_code_generator, mocktail and golden_toolkit.
Your new office
At AH Technology you work with the best experts in the field. In an open environment, where expertise is valued, where we learn from each other and have the freedom to innovate. Our mobile development community counts more than 50+ Mobile Developers.
For more information about AH Technology, you can also visit:
Stack Overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/companies/ah-technology-albert-heijn

Our blogs: https://blog.ah.technology/
Working in a hybrid way is possible (home and office), and our office is located near the train station of Zaandam.
AH Tech Academy
In 2021 we launched our brand new AH Tech Academy. A learning environment organized by and for our colleagues, together with external training partners. The AH Tech Academy is a platform that supports you in your daily work and learning on a daily basis. It offers a variety of courses and training sessions. Besides, the academy is a platform to share experiences and learn from each other's expertise. You will not only find software development trainings, also Agile courses, time management, presentation training and more. You can get your certifications and visit conferences. We invest time, budget and room for both your personal and professional growth. As we are further developing this platform and adding courses and trainings on the go, you can already enjoy the benefits of this program. About the job

What do we offer?
The right ingredients for an impactful job
An annual salary between 50-85K, depending on your experience and based on a full-time workweek (40 hours);
Possibility to work 32-40 hours a week
An additional yearly bonus
An attractive pension plan of which we pay out over 4x times the amount you contribute to the fund. So you ll continue to enjoy a comfortable income even after retiring :-)
A minimum of 20 plus 12.5 extra days paid vacation. Do you want to take that extra time off, or would you rather convert the extra days into discounts or sell them for cash? It s up to you!
Follow training and courses via our AH Tech Academy.
Travel expenses, a laptop and smartphone.
10% staff discount on groceries in all Albert Heijn stores, up to 300 discount a year.
The opportunity to provide everyone with a healthier, tastier, and more sustainable diet. The right ingredients for an impactful job

Requirements
What do you bring
At AH Technology you will be working for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands. To become successful as our new developer you bring:
A Technology/IT Engineering Bachelor certificate or master's degree, or equivalent work experience;
Strong experience as Developer of mobile apps, in native iOS/Android is a must. Also proven experience with Flutter and Dart is a requirement;
Know your way around with Git/Github;
Knowledge and experience on SOLID principles, clean architecture, and testing;
We are looking for both experienced and less experienced mobile developers. Depending on the level of experience you bring, you support product or platform architects when needed, and guide and coach other developers. If you don't check all the boxes, don't worry, we probably don't do either ;-). Feel free to apply and let us have a look at your resume.
More information?
Irene van Rosmalen (Talent Acquisition Partner technology) and hiring manager Jeroen Buitenhuis (Head of Tech) will be happy to help you via irene.van.rosmalen@ah.nl or send a WhatsApp to Irene via 06-23 62 04 40.
Please note: you have already a valid working permit to work in the Netherlands. We can offer extension of your sponsorship, but currently don’t offer relocation from abroad.

Do you also notice that health is becoming an increasingly important theme? Are people in your area also concerned about their health? Quite difficult if you don't know where to find all the right information, right? Want to be part of in signifiant change is this area?
Always dreamed of doing completely something else? Then read on!
Our client recently launched a mobile app. Their app is a beautiful educational platform, through which they share their masterclass, best practices and sound journeys. They can also broadcast various community events to their growing international user base.
Sounds good, we need this from you!
To help them in this mission, they need a technical all-rounder who gets energy from building applications with a huge impact. A React Native specialist with a huge passion for customer experience. Someone who’s willing to join a team. Working with the latest technologies, and building the most fantastic app ever. Don’t worry, they already have plenty set up and know what they want, but this is a truly new initiative to change the way they do things. As Mobile Developer, you ensure the scalability and maintenance of various innovative IT-driven solutions that they continuously improve and expand.
Sounds like a good plan, what do I need to bring?
A good understanding of designing and building applications based on React Native. Of course, you also have worked with JavaScript as well. If you have experience with technologies such as GIT, TypeScript, REST, and Swagger, you will be their "Health guru". And because it's a freelance based job, you need to be based in the Netherlands and you need a registration in the Dutch Kamer van Koophandel.
What’s in it for me?
You get to earn an hourly rate between €80,- and €100,-. It's a 1-year contract with the option for a second year. You have a say in how much you work,between 24 and 40 hours a week. It's a great opportunity to work on an innovative healthcare project and the work environment is hybrid. What's not to like? Talk to us about it! De Organisatie:
Voor een goede klant van mij die actief is door heel Nederland ben ik op zoek naar meerdere Senior .NET Developers. Je komt bij mijn klant in dienst via een medium-lance constructie, wat betekent dat je hier zowel de voordelen van een vaste baan als de financiële voordelen van freelancen krijgt. Je kunt hier dan ook bakken met geld verdienen met hetgeen jij het liefste doet: Prachtige (web)applicaties ontwikkelen in .NET!

Samen met jouw nieuwe werkgever ga je kijken naar geschikte opdrachten die jou aanspreken. Je komt altijd op projecten die binnen een goed bereisbare afstand van je woonplaats liggen en waar jij technisch uitgedaagd wordt. Je gaat je hier dan ook niet vervelen!
De Functie:
Als Senior .NET Developer kom jij terecht bij toonaangevende opdrachtgevers. Je gaat aan de slag met de nieuwste technieken. Er wordt gekeken welke technieken jij beheerst en er wordt vervolgens gekeken met welke opdrachtgever dat matcht. De technieken die vaak terugkomen zijn bijvoorbeeld:
.NET Core, C# en ASP.NET framework 1.0 t/m 4.7;LINQ, MVC, WPF en SQL Server 2008/2012/2014/2016/2017;Javascript, HTML, XML, jQuery en frameworks als React en Angular;Design Patterns;NoSQL, Microservices, Continuous Delivery, TDD, BDD en Single Page Applications;Azure, Mobile Development en Sharepoint;Scrum/Agile.

Uiteraard is het geen enkel probleem als jij niet alle bovenstaande technieken beheerst. Overigens krijg jij hier natuurlijk wel uitgebreid de ruimte om nieuwe technieken te leren en jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen!
Gevraagd Profiel:
Je bent inzetbaar als Fullstack .NET Developer op Senior niveau;Je hebt ervaring of interesse in het werken op detacherings/consultancybasis;Je hebt een afgeronde HBO opleiding in een relevante richting;Je hebt goede communicatieve skills.
Arbeidsvoorwaarden:
Vanzelfsprekend zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden in een medium-lance-constructie erg goed. Zo krijg je:
De mogelijkheid een zeer goed salaris te verdienen (tot € 80.000 per jaar);Een uitstekende mobiliteitsregeling (keuze uit leaseauto, NS Business Card, kilometervergoeding of mobiliteitsvergoeding);Een telefoonvergoeding;Ruime opleidingsmogelijkheden;Een goede pensioenregeling;25 vakantiedagen;En nog veel meer!

Klinkt dit goed en wil je graag solliciteren, of heb je nog aanvullende vragen? Neem dan contact met mij op via 0615490856 of door te mailen naar tim@careervalue.nl!
Dienstverband:
Vast
Salaris:
Boven marktconform
Functie met:
Leaseauto, regelmatig werkzaamheden verrichten op klantlocatie, klanten bezoeken, auto van de zaak, consultancy
Specialisatie:
Fullstack Developer
Gerelateerd:
Fullstack, C#, ASP, CSS, HTML, CSS, SQL, Javascript, WPF, WLF
Gerelateerde vacatures:
Almere: Fulstack .NET ontwikkelaar/medium-lance/salaris tot 90K
Hilversum: Als .NET developer tot €80.000 per jaar verdienen
Almere: Medior .NET Developer bij klein en modern bedrijf te Almere!

Reageren op deze vacature? Neem dan contact op met:
Tim Vonk op telefoonnummer: +31 (0)88 88 33 072 of mobiel: +31 (0)6 15 49 08 56.
Solliciteren kan ook door te mailen naar tim@careervalue.nl of via WhatsApp. Als Senior .NET Developer kom jij terecht bij toonaangevende opdrachtgevers. Je gaat aan de slag met de nieuwste technieken. Er wordt gekeken welke technieken jij beheerst en er wordt vervolgens gekeken met welke opdrachtgever dat matcht. De technieken die vaak terugkomen zijn bijvoorbeeld:
.NET Core, C# en ASP.NET framework 1.0 t/m 4.7;LINQ, MVC, WPF en SQL Server 2008/2012/2014/2016/2017;Javascript, HTML, XML, jQuery en frameworks als React en Angular;Design Patterns;NoSQL, Microservices, Continuous Delivery, TDD, BDD en Single Page Applications;Azure, Mobile Development en Sharepoint;Scrum/Agile.

Uiteraard is het geen enkel probleem als jij niet alle bovenstaande technieken beheerst. Overigens krijg jij hier natuurlijk wel uitgebreid de ruimte om nieuwe technieken te leren en jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen! Vanzelfsprekend zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden in een medium-lance-constructie erg goed. Zo krijg je:
De mogelijkheid een zeer goed salaris te verdienen (tot € 80.000 per jaar);Een uitstekende mobiliteitsregeling (keuze uit leaseauto, NS Business Card, kilometervergoeding of mobiliteitsvergoeding);Een telefoonvergoeding;Ruime opleidingsmogelijkheden;Een goede pensioenregeling;25 vakantiedagen;En nog veel meer!

Klinkt dit goed en wil je graag solliciteren, of heb je nog aanvullende vragen? Neem dan contact met mij op via 0615490856 of door te mailen naar tim@careervalue.nl! Meer weergeven

ID:
11701-27885
Organization:
Our client is a very well-known online company that specializes in selling A quality garments. The company was founded as a start-up only a few years ago but through a unique vision, very stylish products in a new niche they have made it quite well for themselves. This company has grown far beyond the web-shop alone, they have different sales channels, online and offline and lead the branch by example.
Because of the expanding business and endless opportunities this company had, they are looking for enforcement in the form of an experienced PHP developer.
Job description:
As part of their team, you will be collaborating with a mix of permanent and freelance developers, and you will be working in an agile way. The role involves exposure to Symfony 3, building new websites, as well as adding new features to existing websites. This includes application code and database structure, so a good level of SQL knowledge is essential.
Requirements:
Excellent PHP skills (Symfony / Laravel)
SQL skills and working knowledge of MySQL & PostgreSQL
JavaScript, jQuery
HTML, CSS

Terms of employment:
Competitive salary, bonusses, certifications, pension, benefits

ID:
1871-52108
Organization:
For an international company in The Hague (NL) I am seeking for a iOS developer with at least 1.5 years of professional experience within the field of mobile development. This company consists of 25 highly educated (Bachelor / Master in the field of IT) professionals who create innovative and complex applications for the telecommunication sector.
Due their international ambitions (they have opened sales offices outside of The Netherlands) the teams consists of professionals from all over the world. Therefore it is not required for a candidate to master the Dutch language; English speaking candidates are welcome to join. The company even assists developers if they are open to relocation to The Netherlands. This makes this vacancy a unique chance for an ambitious, talented iOS developer who is looking for a permanent job in The Netherlands!
Job description:
As a iOS developer you will be working on the development of a complex app which communicates through a JSON Rest/API with the backend. This app will be targeted to business-to-business telecommunication markets worldwide. They use Swift as a basis and you get the opportunity to work on several interesting projects where you are involved in the actual developing and the releasing of the applications. The team consists of iOS but also experienced Android developers so you get the chance to learn from experts within the field of mobile development and so grow significantly as a developer. Once you are 'up and running', you will be given enough freedom and opportunities to approach your work in the way you like. The company is considered very flexible and progressive. Because of the fact that they have multiple teams and different projects, you get to experience multiple aspects of mobile development which will make you a better developer and will keep your work challenging / interesting for a long period of time.
Requirements:
You have a bachelor or master degree with IT componentYou have at least 1.5 years professional experience as a iOS developerYou have experience with Swift developmentYou are ambitious, a teamplayer and self-reliantYou have good knowledge of the English languageYou are open for relocation to The Netherlands on a short notice
Terms of employment:
Your salary depends on your experience and knowledge regarding iOS development.
The range is set between 3000 and 5000 euro gross a month.
You will also receive travel allowance, pension, help with relocation, holiday allowance etc..

This is a GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY for a non-Dutch speaking iOS developer who wants to become part of a growing and ambitious Dutch company.
Interested in this job? Please send me your resume at tim@careervalue.nl or contact me at (0031)615490856.
Employment contract:
Permanent
Salary:
3500 - 5000 euro
Job with:
Permanent location, permanent team, not having to travel far
Specialization:
Native Developer iOS
Related:
IOS ontwikkelaar, Native vacature, Mobile developer, Ontwikkelaar Mobile Apps

About the jobAs Senior Front Developer at YTEC, you'll be responsible for building and maintaining web applications and help our organization to step up our front-end game. We want to grow a solid high quality front-end team within the organization and we need someone who can help us lead the way.You'll work together with a Front-End developer colleague (1) and closely with our back-end developers (7) to deliver consistent and reliable web experience. When necessary you can work together with external mobile devs, UX/UI designers and graphic designers.You have (a lot) of experience with modern front-end frameworks like vue.js or similar.You are used to work agile and will be closely working together with our internal product owner to determine priorities and goals.About youYou have extensive experience with HTML, CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Typescript and Vuejs or similarYou have knowledge of the entire web development process (version control, design, implement, testing, debugging, maintaining).You are capable of implementing a resilient web architecture.You are analytical and you have a keen eye for details.You have great problem-solving skills and you work well in a team.You have experience with coaching and mentoring other developers.You can identify and establish patterns and best practices for building optimal web experiencesExperience with python/Django and SQL is a preMust be proficient in English, fluent (Dutch is a pre)Soort dienstverband: Voltijds, Vaste baanSalaris: €3.000,00 - €4.500,00 per maandAanvullende vergoedingen:BonusregelingVakantiegeldArbeidsvoorwaarden:Werk vanuit huisWinstdelingWerkschema:DagdienstOpleiding:MBO (Gewenst) About the jobAs Senior Front Developer at YTEC, you'll be responsible for building and maintaining web applications and help our organization to step up our front-end game. Hou je van Agile werken in een dynamische omgeving waarin ruimte is voor innovatie en continue verbetering? Als jij een developer bent die zich wil bijscholen in onze ontwikkeltooling Outsystems en Oracle, dan zoeken wij jou.Wat ga je doen?Je werkt samen met je collega developers, testers en requirements engineers aan het uitwerken van de epics op onze roadmap.In onze (Scrumban) teams zorg jij ervoor dat stories worden gegroomed en gebouwd en probeer je bij te dragen aan onze experimenteersessies.Je bent in staat stories zelfstandig uit te werken, rekening houdend met onze standaarden en eisen vanuit architectuur etc.Je bent geïnteresseerd in de (technische) ontwikkelingen in je vakgebied en probeert van daaruit bij te dragen aan verbeteringen die wij kunnen doorvoeren bijvoorbeeld in de architectuur, gebruikte technologieën en patterns.Wij zetten Oracle plsql in om data op te halen uit een Oracle database. Vervolgens wordt in onze generieke business layer de business logica gebouwd en daarboven de applicatielogica, Hiervoor maken wij gebruik van Outsystems als ontwikkelplatform. Je hebt hier of al ervaring in, of je wilt je hier graag in bekwamen.Wat breng je mee?Kennis van / ervaring met:Uitmuntende kennis van minimaal één 3e generatie programmeertaal, hoeft niet noodzakelijk een relatie te hebben met Oracle en/of OutSystemsVermogen om analytisch en op hoog abstractieniveau te denkenDe volgende kennis is een pré:Oracle stack:Oracle Database (incl. pl/sql en sql)Oracle Designer en Oracle DeveloperOracle application serverKennis van integraties zoals RabbitMQ, Soap, REST, XML, JSON etc.Kennis van web en mobileKennis van OutsystemsKennis van ElasticSearchEn als persoon:Heb je een klantgerichte instellingNeem je verantwoordelijkheid en initiatiefBen je creatief en oplossingsgerichtBeschik je over goede communicatieve vaardigheden en flexibiliteitWat vragen wij?Afgeronde HBO/WO opleiding met een ICT component of vergelijkbaarMinimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaringWat bieden wij?Een uitdagende werkomgeving en interessante klanten in een dynamische brancheEen informele cultuur met veel vrijheid in je werkRuimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling en verdere groeiMarktconforme primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaardenWie zijn wij?Pivoton is dé IT-business partner voor de flexmarkt met een unieke combinatie van expertises op het gebied van het uitzendproces, IT-oplossingen en wet- en regelgeving. Deze kennis hebben wij in meer dan 30 jaar opgebouwd en dat maakt ons een gerespecteerde IT partner binnen de flexmarkt.Pivoton biedt software voor de administratieve en commerciële processen in de flexmarkt als SaaS-oplossing en verzorgt de complete backoffice verwerking van urendeclaraties en facturatie. Wij geven klanten samenhangend advies en begeleiding bij het inrichten, inzetten, optimaliseren en onderhouden van de IT-oplossingen die bepalend zijn voor hun toekomst. Volledige ontzorging en procesoptimalisatie staan hierbij altijd voorop. We doen dit samen met ongeveer 35 collega’s op een informele wijze waarbij flexibiliteit en samenwerking belangrijke drivers zijn. Pivoton werkt volledig Agile.Interesse?Heb je interesse in jouw mogelijkheden bij Pivoton, dan zien wij jouw sollicitatie en CV graag tegemoet via de solliciteerbutton.Heb je vragen of wil je meer informatie over deze vacature, bel dan naar Bart Hemmer (CTO), T 06-83651013.Soort dienstverband: Voltijds, Vaste baanSalaris: €3.000,00 - €5.500,00 per maandRooster:ma-vrSecundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden:Extra vakantiedagenFietsplanKerstpakketPensioenReiskostenvergoedingWerk vanuit huisSoorten aanvullende vergoedingen:VakantiegeldMogelijkheid om te reizen/verhuizen:Ede: kunnen pendelen of van plan zijn te verhuizen voordat het contract ingaat (Gewenst) Hou je van Agile werken in een dynamische omgeving waarin ruimte is voor innovatie en continue verbetering? ID:
5173-21104
De Organisatie:
Mijn opdrachtgever heeft een nieuw pand geopend in de regio van Wageningen en de core business binnen dit pand is het maken van Serious Gaming applications voor mobile devices. De apps worden bijvoorbeeld gemaakt voor scholen om leerlingen bekwaam te maken in diverse buitenlandse talen of bijvoorbeeld het vak wiskunde.

Bij deze organisatie kan je een dynamische werkomgeving verwachten aangezien het bedrijf nog maar net bestaat en veel mensen zoekt om het team te versterken. Door het binnen halen van diverse mooie grote klanten is er genoeg werk voor je te doen. Zowel voor klanten binnen Nederland als buiten Nederland.
De Functie:
Je voelt je thuis in een resultaat gedreven development team. Je bent bereid om intensief samen te werken aan projecten of je werkt graag zelfstandig aan een project. Je ontwikkelt voornamelijk op het kantoor. Wanneer je dat niet doet, zit je bij een klant om te luisteren naar zijn wensen of ideëen aan te brengen. Je werkt op het begin veel samen met een senior mobile app developer om de bedrijfseigen manier van ontwikkelen te ervaren. Jouw focus in het team ligt op apps voor apparaten met iOS. Vanzelfsprekend ben je dus bekend met Objective-C, Xcode, Xamarin (cross-platform).
Gevraagd Profiel:
Afgeronde HBO/WO opleiding met als richting informatica;Ervaring met Objective C, Xcode, Xamarin;Kennis van Java Android en C# Unity;Ervaring met het maken van professionele (3D) designs;Ervaring met diverse photoshop tools;Leergierig karakter;Communicatief vaardig;Geen 9-5 mentaliteit.
Arbeidsvoorwaarden:
Prima arbeidsvoorwaarden en bovendien flexibel. Er kan op elk gebied iets voor je geregeld worden. Denk aan verzekeringen, vakantiedagen, salaris.
Interesse? Neem dan contact op met Tim Vonk via telefoon op: 06-15490856 of via mail op: tim@careervalue.nl! Ook kan je hem een Whatsapp bericht sturen waar hij direct op zal reageren. Hij zorgt er voor dat je in dezelfde week al op gesprek kunt gaan!
Dienstverband:
Vast
Salaris:
2500 - 4000 euro
Functie met:
Vaste werklocatie, werken in een vast team, niet te ver reizen, vaste werkplek, vaste standplaats
Specialisatie:
Mobile development algemeen
Gerelateerd:
Mobile development vacature, Native, App developer
Plaatsen in de omgeving:
Ede, Renkum, Lunteren, Bennekom
Gerelateerde vacatures:
Kootwijkerbroek: Android Developer voor complexe apps gezocht!
Arnhem: Ondernemende Mobile Developer die functie vrij mag aankleden
Velp: iOS Developer gezocht voor toonaangevende club!
Geldermalsen: Mobile Developer voor technische apps
Oosterbeek: iOS Specialist
